name: Lash Creative
tagline: we apply lashings of creativity & digital wizardry
description: Lash Creative is a digital marketing agency with offices in Sydney, Australia and Seoul, Korea. From Social Media content & campaigns to Microsites to Apps, we always place the audience in the center of everything that we do. Our aim is to create sound strategies that inform visually crafted solutions to effect a change in the way our audience thinks, feels and does.
